4918.Text: - When will this nightmare end? - Let it all go.

4927.Text: - Beautiful day to fly. - Sure is.

4929.Text: Between you and me, I was dying to get out of that office.

5382.Text: You have got to start thinking bee, my friend.

5387.Text: Thinking bee! Thinking bee! Get smart and start thinking bee!

5392.Text: ♪ - Flying here and buzzing there ♪ ♪ - I'm loving the views ♪

5394.Text: ♪ Listen to me, cousin Every buzzer must choose to be a bee ♪

5399.Text: ♪ - Or not to be ♪ ♪ - Start thinking bee ♪

5402.Text: ♪ - Barry, you got no occupation ♪ ♪ - You mean like pollination? ♪

5405.Text: ♪ - Hey, now, that's thinking bee! ♪ ♪ - Start thinking bee ♪

5408.Text: ♪ Listen, fella Ain't you been on the tour? ♪

5410.Text: ♪ - Your stripes are black and yella ♪ ♪ - I just want to be sure ♪

5413.Text: ♪ - To be a bee ♪ ♪ - Start thinking bee ♪

5415.Text: ♪ - Can't I wait and see? ♪ ♪ - No, Barry, that's not to be ♪

5418.Text: ♪ Be a busy little bee Not a tizzy little bee ♪

5421.Text: Hold it. Let's just stop for a second. Hold it.

5424.Text: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, everyone. Can we stop here?

5428.Text: I'm not making a major life decision during a production number!

5431.Text: All right. Take ten, everybody. Wrap it up, guys.
